content: Return to the main path and follow this up the mountain. You'll come to a set of stairs, with a Rhino Flame Master at the top of it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'The Emerald Hall' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Crimson Silver Cart'.
The content is as follows:
Return to the main path and follow this up the mountain. You'll come to a set of stairs, with a Rhino Flame Master at the top of it.
